name: Shooter Fun 2.0
description:
-- Controls -- 
  • W - Forward
  • A - Left
  • S -Back
  • D - Right
  • Mouse - looks / turns
  • Left Mouse - fire
  • Right Mouse - Zoom in
  • R - Reload
  • 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 - Inventory to switch guns

You can find weapons and items on the map to useDifferent weapons have different damage values and the rockets are fun

Player profiles can be created to track player stats

AI names can be added/changes inside the Unity Shooter Fun_Data folder inside the Names.txt file. Add as many as you want remove some, but you need to have at least one name set

*** I am working on adding more levels and Game types at the moment. Please bear with me as I continue to work on this. ***
